resources.string: Please enter a valid phone number.
Are you sure this your number? Go ahead and check again!
Looks like something has gone wrong. We are working on it. Check back in a few minutes.
Couldn\'t delete message, please try again later
Couldn\'t edit message, please try again later
Oops! looks like you are not connected to the internet. Please check and try again.
We are unable to connect you at this time. Please try again later.
Tip: Should be between 4 and 14 characters.
Please enter the 4-digit code sent by SMS to the phone number you entered in the previous screen.
